channel.title: Understanding Misc.Random

item.title: Understanding Misc.Random
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

Ok, well I got this…

if (misc.random(0) == 1) { dealDamage(7); hitDiff = 7; plrTextUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; plrText = "Damn!"; setAnimation(881); } else { dealDamage(15); hitDiff = 7; plrTextUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; plrText = "Damn!"; setAnimation(881); }
How would I make it that sometimes it makes it misc.random = 1?

Read full topic
